data.text: À koolei vɛ Siyɔn,
Toɠa ga kpidi ɓɔi volo wolai,
Abui ɠa faa zuɠoloɠolo ɠɛɛzu tuɠɔʋelei,
Ɗa ti ɠaana, ɗa ɠɛ nɔ sooiti,
Ti-maalugi ɠɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ kɔɔɠɔ wotolo mɔinmɔingi lugi,
Ti maaɓuɠazuʋɛ, ɛsɛ pɛ ka luazu,
Ta ɓizɛzu eɠɛ ɠuluɓaiti,
Ta la bɔɔla laaʋilisu,
Ta taai maaleʋesu,
Zooi ɠa ɓalizu ti luɠɔ,
Naama ziɛ su Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa loni ná-kɔɔʋɛbɛi luɠɔ,
«À ɠale ma pɔ̀ ʋolu.
Wo ɠɔba zeɠeiti tɛi wa ti ʋali ga, kɛni wo-yiiti.
Ɓɛ ɠa é kwɛɛ ni tanisu kigi la valiboga,
À koolei vɛ Siyɔn,
À nuɓusɛi ɠaalɛ ba,
Zalaɠa ɠula nuiti ti wɔlɔ tɛɛ wosuʋɛ ta zalaɠa ɠulazuʋɛ yɔɠɔzuʋɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wɔinʋɛ ga ná-zooi,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-nuɓusɛiti gooɠaaʋotegɛ,
Nà wo zili nui maaɠooza wo ʋa,
Ɗɛigi è ga zooi, mina mɔ lua, ɠoozunɛ, è ɠɔkɔ!
Wa ɓalaa, dɔɓɔ zuaiti, à mina mɔ lua pa.
Siyɔn zei wo nuiti, à ɠɔkɔ ga koozunɛɛi,
Molo loɠazuʋɛti daa ɠa ve ga molo ɠae,
«Konagi niiti kpein kotogiti ti koloɠologa wo ma,
Wa laami, wo yiɠo,
Wa suɠwɛɛ naazu ga nà wo zaama, Izilayɛle nuiti,
